com.flir.flironesdk

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flir.flironesdk.Frame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadedFrame, RBPFrame

    public abstract class Frame
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a raw frame received from the camera that can be rendered into a colorized, MSX, or visible-only image with a FrameProcessor instance.
    See Also:
    FrameProcessor

    • Method Summary

      abstract void save(java.io.File file, FrameProcessor frameProcessor)
      Saves a thermal JPEG file, which has a rendered visual preview and embedded thermal data.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        @Deprecated
public void save(java.io.File file,
                             RenderedImage.Palette previewPalette,
                             RenderedImage.ImageType previewImageType)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. 
        Saves a thermal JPEG file, which has a rendered visual preview and embedded thermal data.
        Parameters:
        file - Your app must have permission to write to this file.
        previewPalette - The palette to use for the preview image.
        previewImageType - The type of rendering for the preview image. Must be one of ThermalRGBA8888Image, BlendedMSXRGBA8888Image, or VisualYCbCr888Image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if previewImageType is not valid

      • save

        public abstract void save(java.io.File file,
                          FrameProcessor frameProcessor)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a thermal JPEG file, which has a rendered visual preview and embedded thermal data.
        Parameters:
        file - The destination file to save
        frameProcessor - The frame processor with settings for the preview image. Note: if multiple frame types are selected in the frame processor, BlendedMSXRGBA8888Image will be preferred, followed by ThermalRGBA8888Image and VisualYCbCr888Image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the file.
